text: Hmm this doesn't quite work, I think? With the `@parameters` macro since it says either Num or Array has no field `e` when parsing the equations. When I try to dive deeper, I'm not sure how to make the symbol, since the usual way to make an array symbol (what `@parameters`  does) relies on `Sym(name, inds)` having numeric `inds`. Anyway I'm fine with being unable to do this -- would've just been a convenience
